title: Instructional Technology Design Workshop Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Organizational Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Supplemental Materials and Configurable Collaborative Learning Spaces

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three types of cognitive load (intrinsic/extraneous/germane) and apply them to real educational cases
Learners can create workflow charts that optimize the presentation of visual and auditory information
Learners can specify a stepwise information segmentation strategy to achieve learning objectives in project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
